gen:link.msg:message: Reported value of `IntangibleAssets` at end of period SHOULD be equal to sum of reported value of `IntangibleAssets` at beginning of period and changes in that value during period, `IntangibleAssetsMovement`. | {if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_NotesConsolidatedIntangibleAssetsIntangibleAssetsOtherMovementSpecification_PrtFST1PeriodStartMutationPeriodEnd1_IntangibleAssetsEnd')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_NotesConsolidatedIntangibleAssetsIntangibleAssetsOtherMovementSpecification_PrtFST1PeriodStartMutationPeriodEnd1_IntangibleAssetsEnd return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}{if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_NotesConsolidatedIntangibleAssetsIntangibleAssetsOtherMovementSpecification_PrtFST1PeriodStartMutationPeriodEnd1_IntangibleAssetsStart')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_NotesConsolidatedIntangibleAssetsIntangibleAssetsOtherMovementSpecification_PrtFST1PeriodStartMutationPeriodEnd1_IntangibleAssetsStart return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}{if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_NotesConsolidatedIntangibleAssetsIntangibleAssetsOtherMovementSpecification_PrtFST1PeriodStartMutationPeriodEnd1_IntangibleAssetsMovement')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_NotesConsolidatedIntangibleAssetsIntangibleAssetsOtherMovementSpecification_PrtFST1PeriodStartMutationPeriodEnd1_IntangibleAssetsMovement return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}

`IntangibleAssetsActualCostPrice` SHOULD NOT be reported, because `IntangibleAssetsCostPrice` is reported. | {if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_NotesConsolidatedIntangibleAssetsIntangibleAssetsOtherMovementSpecification_PrtFST1ExistenceThnNoExistence1_IntangibleAssetsCostPrice')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_NotesConsolidatedIntangibleAssetsIntangibleAssetsOtherMovementSpecification_PrtFST1ExistenceThnNoExistence1_IntangibleAssetsCostPrice return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}{if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_NotesConsolidatedIntangibleAssetsIntangibleAssetsOtherMovementSpecification_PrtFST1ExistenceThnNoExistence1_IntangibleAssetsActualCostPrice')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_NotesConsolidatedIntangibleAssetsIntangibleAssetsOtherMovementSpecification_PrtFST1ExistenceThnNoExistence1_IntangibleAssetsActualCostPrice return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}

`IntangibleAssetsMovement` SHOULD be equal to the summation of the underlying values. | {if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_NotesConsolidatedIntangibleAssetsIntangibleAssetsOtherMovementSpecification_PrtFST1SumOfChildrenParentDebit1T2_IntangibleAssetsMovement')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_NotesConsolidatedIntangibleAssetsIntangibleAssetsOtherMovementSpecification_PrtFST1SumOfChildrenParentDebit1T2_IntangibleAssetsMovement return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}{if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_NotesConsolidatedIntangibleAssetsIntangibleAssetsOtherMovementSpecification_PrtFST1SumOfChildrenParentDebit1T2_ChildrenOfIntangibleAssetsMovementDebit')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_NotesConsolidatedIntangibleAssetsIntangibleAssetsOtherMovementSpecification_PrtFST1SumOfChildrenParentDebit1T2_ChildrenOfIntangibleAssetsMovementDebit return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}{if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_NotesConsolidatedIntangibleAssetsIntangibleAssetsOtherMovementSpecification_PrtFST1SumOfChildrenParentDebit1T2_ChildrenOfIntangibleAssetsMovementCredit')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_NotesConsolidatedIntangibleAssetsIntangibleAssetsOtherMovementSpecification_PrtFST1SumOfChildrenParentDebit1T2_ChildrenOfIntangibleAssetsMovementCredit return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}

`IntangibleAssets` SHOULD be equal to the summation of the underlying values. | {if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_NotesConsolidatedIntangibleAssetsIntangibleAssetsOtherMovementSpecification_PrtFST1SumOfChildrenParentDebit1T1_IntangibleAssets')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_NotesConsolidatedIntangibleAssetsIntangibleAssetsOtherMovementSpecification_PrtFST1SumOfChildrenParentDebit1T1_IntangibleAssets return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}{if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_NotesConsolidatedIntangibleAssetsIntangibleAssetsOtherMovementSpecification_PrtFST1SumOfChildrenParentDebit1T1_ChildrenOfIntangibleAssetsDebit')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_NotesConsolidatedIntangibleAssetsIntangibleAssetsOtherMovementSpecification_PrtFST1SumOfChildrenParentDebit1T1_ChildrenOfIntangibleAssetsDebit return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}{if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_NotesConsolidatedIntangibleAssetsIntangibleAssetsOtherMovementSpecification_PrtFST1SumOfChildrenParentDebit1T1_ChildrenOfIntangibleAssetsCredit')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_NotesConsolidatedIntangibleAssetsIntangibleAssetsOtherMovementSpecification_PrtFST1SumOfChildrenParentDebit1T1_ChildrenOfIntangibleAssetsCredit return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}
